pages.text: $(li)Wanderer's Boots increases your movement speed.$(br)$(li)This effect can be upgrade walking over the world.$(br)$(li)It only can be found in Dungeon Chests.

$(l)Movement Speed Levels$()$(br)$(li)Level 1 Speed 1.2x$(br) 0/1000 Blocks Travelled$(br)$(li)Level 2 Speed 1.25x$(br) 1000/5000 Blocks Travelled$(br)$(li)Level 3 Speed 1.3x$(br) 5000/10000 Blocks Travelled$(br)$(li)Level 4 Speed 1.35x$(br) 10000/50000 Blocks Travelled$(br)$(li)Level 5 Speed 1.4x$(br) 50000/50000 Blocks Travelled
